channel.title: Um, where's the Blurite Bar?
channel.description:
I scanned my item config file and it doesn't appear to be there.
All I find when I search up "Blurite" is the Blurite Sword and the Blurite Ore. Can somebody tell me whether this is missing or not? It's not important if it is missing, but is there any way to add it if it is?
Thank you.

item.title: Um, where's the Blurite Bar?
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

There is a Blurite Bar, but I believe it was not too long ago, so I don’t think it is in Mopar’s cache yet.

Read full topic

item.title: Um, where's the Blurite Bar?
item.dc:creator: @nueb35 Nueb35
item.description:
@nueb35 wrote:

i dont think there is one in runescape dont u take 5 iron bars and 2 ores to the guy to make it? no bar tho >.>

Read full topic
